dc_description_s: Four bar scales showing stadia Olimpica, milliaria Romana, rastae Germanicae, and stadia Alexandri.; Plate 13 from Bonne, Rigobert. Receuil de cartes sur la geographie ancienne [1783].; In lower left: "a Paris chez Lattré rue Ste. Jacques."; In upper right: "No. 13."; Boundaries indicated by hand coloring.|30 x 43 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:3,000,000|General Map Collection
